attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many people have been in the uk for as long, as we can think the majority of Caribbean people are immigrants Caribbean people are also a migratory people and have settled elsewhere such as South, Central and North America but many have settled in the place that they called home and that place is in Britain. So I call for legal immigrant amnesty for those people who have been in the country for at lest 7 year's. We all know that amnesty dose work in other country like in america spain so why can't it work in the uk.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
